original_text: But if there is no one to interpret, let each of them keep silent in church and speak to himself and to God.
korean_text: 만일 통역하는 자가 없으면 교회에서는 잠잠하고 자기와 하나님께 말할 것이요

sentences.original_text: But if there is no one to interpret
let each of them keep silent in church
and speak to himself and to God.
